premiumDialog.title: SwapMyContact Pro тАУ Annual Subscription
premiumDialog.description: The basic version allows only one profile.\nWith SwapMyContact Pro you can create unlimited profiles.
premiumDialog.autoRenew: The subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the period.
premiumDialog.billingIOS: Billing is done through your Apple ID account. Subscriptions can be managed and canceled in your Apple ID settings.
premiumDialog.billingAndroid: Billing is done through your Google Play account. Subscriptions can be managed and canceled in your Google Play account settings.
premiumDialog.successMessage: Premium activated! You can now create unlimited profiles.
premiumDialog.errorMessage: Purchase failed. Please try again later.
